meanings.definition: To deprive of natural characteristics or properties.
meanings.sent1: Using too much artificial coloring denaturalizes the food.
meanings.sent2: The chemical process denaturalizes the fabric, making it lose its softness.
meanings.sent3: Adding neon lights to the garden denaturalizes its peaceful vibe.
meanings.sent4: The loud music denaturalizes the quiet atmosphere of the library.
meanings.sent5: The harsh winter denaturalizes the once lush green landscape.

meanings.sent1: The use of CGI denaturalizes the movie scenes.
meanings.sent2: The plastic flowers denaturalize the beauty of the garden.
meanings.sent3: Wearing a clown wig denaturalizes his serious look.
meanings.sent4: The bright neon sign denaturalizes the historic building.
meanings.sent5: The fake smile denaturalizes her true emotions.
